The 27th Fangoria Chainsaw Awards honored the best horror films that were released between July 2024 and June 2025. The nominees were announced on July 9, 2025. The ceremony was livestreamed on Shudder on October 19, 2025.
Among the nominees, Sinners and The Substance led with ten nominations each. The latter received four wins, including Best Wide Release.
